verses.verse: In the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of the reign <S%H4467><s%> of Jehoiakim <S%H3079><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josiah, <S%H2977><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> came this word <S%H1697><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> from Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to me: <S%H6213><s%> Make bonds <S%H4147><s%> and bars, <S%H4133><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> them on your neck; <S%H6677><s%>

and send <S%H7971><s%> them to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Edom, <S%H123><s%> and to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and to the king <S%H4428><s%> of the children of Ammon, <S%H1121><s%> and to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Tyre, <S%H6865><s%> and to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Sidon, <S%H6721><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the messengers <S%H4397><s%> who come <S%H935><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah; <S%H3063><s%>

and give them a command <S%H6680><s%> to their masters, <S%H113><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> You shall tell <S%H559><s%> your masters: <S%H113><s%>

I have made <S%H6213><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> the men <S%H120><s%> and the animals <S%H929><s%> that are on <S%H6440><s%> the surface of the earth, <S%H776><s%> by my great <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H3581><s%> and by my outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm; <S%H2220><s%> and I give <S%H5414><s%> it to whom it seems <S%H5869><s%> right to me. <S%H3474><s%>

Now have I given <S%H5414><s%> all these lands <S%H776><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> my servant; <S%H5650><s%> and the animals <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> also have I given <S%H5414><s%> him to serve him. <S%H5647><s%>

All the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall serve <S%H5647><s%> him, <S%H1121><s%> and his son, and his son <S%H1121><s%>'s son, <S%H1121><s%> until the time <S%H6256><s%> of his own land <S%H776><s%> come: <S%H935><s%> and then many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> shall make him their bondservant. <S%H5647><s%>

It shall happen, <S%H1471><s%> that the nation and the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> which will not serve <S%H5647><s%> the same Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and that will not put <S%H5414><s%> their neck <S%H6677><s%> under the yoke <S%H5923><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> that nation <S%H1471><s%> will I punish, <S%H6485><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> with the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and with the famine, <S%H7458><s%> and with the pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> until I have consumed <S%H8552><s%> them by his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

But as for you, <S%H8085><s%> don't you listen to your prophets, <S%H5030><s%> nor to your diviners, <S%H7080><s%> nor to your dreams, <S%H2472><s%> nor to your soothsayers, <S%H6049><s%> nor to your sorcerers, <S%H3786><s%> who speak <S%H559><s%> to you, <S%H559><s%> saying, You shall not serve <S%H5647><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon: <S%H894><s%>

for they prophesy <S%H5012><s%> a lie <S%H8267><s%> to you, <S%H7368><s%> to remove you far from your land, <S%H127><s%> and that I should drive you out, <S%H5080><s%> and you should perish. <S%H6><s%>

But the nation <S%H1471><s%> that shall bring <S%H935><s%> their neck <S%H6677><s%> under the yoke <S%H5923><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> him, <S%H3240><s%> that nation will I let remain in their own land, <S%H127><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and they shall till <S%H5647><s%> it, <S%H3427><s%> and dwell therein.

I spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> according to all these words, <S%H1697><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Bring <S%H935><s%> your necks <S%H6677><s%> under the yoke <S%H5923><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> him and his people, <S%H5971><s%> and live. <S%H2421><s%>

Why will you die, <S%H4191><s%> you and your people, <S%H5971><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> by the famine, <S%H7458><s%> and by the pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> concerning the nation <S%H1471><s%> that will not serve <S%H5647><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon? <S%H894><s%>

Don't <S%H8085><s%> listen to the words <S%H1697><s%> of the prophets <S%H5030><s%> who speak <S%H559><s%> to you, <S%H559><s%> saying, You shall not serve <S%H5647><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon; <S%H894><s%> for they prophesy <S%H5012><s%> a lie to you. <S%H8267><s%>

For I have not sent <S%H7971><s%> them, <S%H5002><s%> says Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> but they prophesy <S%H5012><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%> in my name; <S%H8034><s%> that I may drive you out, <S%H5080><s%> and that you may perish, <S%H6><s%> you, <S%H5030><s%> and the prophets who prophesy to you. <S%H5012><s%>

Also I spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the priests <S%H3548><s%> and to all this people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> Don't <S%H8085><s%> listen to the words <S%H1697><s%> of your prophets <S%H5030><s%> who prophesy <S%H5012><s%> to you, <S%H559><s%> saying, Behold, <S%H3627><s%> the vessels of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> shall now shortly <S%H4120><s%> be brought again <S%H7725><s%> from Babylon; <S%H894><s%> for they prophesy <S%H5012><s%> a lie to you. <S%H8267><s%>
Don't <S%H8085><s%> listen to them; <S%H5647><s%> serve the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and live: <S%H2421><s%> why should this city <S%H5892><s%> become a desolation? <S%H2723><s%>

But if they be prophets, <S%H5030><s%> and if the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> be <S%H3426><s%> with them, <S%H6293><s%> let them now make intercession to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> that the vessels <S%H3627><s%> which are left <S%H3498><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and at Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> don't <S%H935><s%> go to Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

For thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> concerning the pillars, <S%H5982><s%> and concerning the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and concerning the bases, <S%H4350><s%> and concerning the residue <S%H3499><s%> of the vessels <S%H3627><s%> that are left <S%H3498><s%> in this city, <S%H5892><s%>

which Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> didn't <S%H3947><s%> take, when he carried away captive <S%H1540><s%> Jeconiah <S%H3204><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiakim, <S%H3079><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> from Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and all the nobles <S%H2715><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%>

yes, <S%H559><s%> thus says Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> concerning the vessels <S%H3627><s%> that are left <S%H3498><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and at Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%>

They shall be carried <S%H935><s%> to Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and there shall they be, <S%H3117><s%> until the day that I visit <S%H6485><s%> them, <S%H5002><s%> says Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> then will I bring <S%H5927><s%> them up, <S%H7725><s%> and restore them to this place. <S%H4725><s%>
